title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s own repo: the Go CLI/server that pulls and runs Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with a built-in model library and OpenAI-compatible REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / npm package for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: First-party LangChain integration; use Ollama models for chat, tools, RAG, agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat UI, model manager, RAG, dark mode) that talks to local Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation persistence, and shortcuts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, Spring Boot starters on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, pull, delete.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama; strong typing, tokio streams, embed in CLI or server apps.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embeddings, shipped on NuGet.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; plug local Ollama models into production RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server + models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker image (CPU & CUDA) with compose examples for quick local/cloud runs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you summarize, rewrite, or chat with your notes using any Ollama model.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin for AI-assisted block rewriting, summarization, and Q&A via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example showing how to scale Ollama models across a GPU cluster with autoscaling.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI micro-service template that wraps Ollama with JWT auth, rate limits, and OpenAI-style endpoints.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in replacement CLI for OpenAI Codex that uses local Ollama models for code completion.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for model recommendations, troubleshooting, and sharing community projects around Ollama.
